en: Their team's name is NWO.
zh: 他们的队名叫NWO。

en: Their team doesn't have a ghost of a chance of winning this season.
zh: 他们的队伍这个赛季一点赢的机会都没有。

en: We are three points ahead of their team.
zh: 我们队比他们队领先三分。

en: Their first fall there was a trial for them.
zh: 他们第一次摔倒的时候，对他们来说是个考验。

en: I don't know all of them.
zh: 我不是全部都认识他们。

en: Follow close behind them.
zh: 紧跟在他们后面。

en: Their concert was a big hit.
zh: 他们的演唱会非常成功。

en: Let them take care of themselves.
zh: 让他们自己照顾自己吧。

en: Their quarrel sprung from misunderstanding.
zh: 他们的争吵源于误解。

en: There are many factors behind the quarrel between them.
zh: 他们之间的争吵有很多因素。

en: Join me with them in their movement.
zh: 加入我和他们一起参与他们的运动。

en: Thanks to them, I got well at last.
zh: 多亏了他们，我终于康复了。

en: Their climbing of Mt. Everest was a great achievement.
zh: 他们攀登珠穆朗玛峰是一项伟大的成就。

en: None of them could understand what she was implying.
zh: 他们谁也无法理解她暗示的意思。

en: None of them are present.
zh: 他们没有一个人到场。

en: Several of them are opposed to the bill.
zh: 他们中有几个人反对这项法案。

en: How many of them survived is not known.
zh: 他们有多少人幸存下来还不清楚。

en: I hope that neither of them was involved in the traffic accident.
zh: 我希望他们中没有人卷入那场交通事故。

en: I hope that neither of them were involved in that traffic accident.
zh: 我希望他们中没有人卷入那场交通事故。

en: Which of them can sing better?
zh: 他们中谁唱歌更好听？

en: Which of them is your brother?
zh: 他们中哪个是你的兄弟？

en: The three of them were the only ones to apologize to her.
zh: 他们三个人是唯一向她道歉的人。

en: Two of them were drowned.
zh: 他们中有两个人溺水身亡。

en: Over ten percent of them can do the work.
zh: 他们中有超过百分之十的人能胜任这项工作。

en: None of them were present at the meeting.
zh: 他们没有一个人出席会议。

en: I overheard their mockery.
zh: 我无意中听到了他们的嘲笑。

en: They broke up after 7 years of marriage.
zh: 他们结婚七年后分手了。

en: Their only son has been dead for three years.
zh: 他们的独生子已经去世三年了。

en: Three quarters of them agreed.
zh: 他们中有四分之三的人同意了。

en: He stopped talking to them.
zh: 他不再和他们说话了。

en: He stopped to talk to them.
zh: 他停下来和他们说话。

en: I walked quietly so that they would not hear me.
zh: 我安静地走着，免得他们听见我。

en: I'm considering going with them.
zh: 我正在考虑和他们一起去。

en: They had a baby last week.
zh: 他们上周生了个孩子。

en: A baby was born to them.
zh: 他们生了个孩子。

en: May the blessing of God be upon them.
zh: 愿上帝保佑他们。

en: I'll have them repair my car.
zh: 我会让他们修理我的车。

en: I'll have to make amends to them for my mistake.
zh: 我必须为我的错误向他们赔罪。

en: I could not make myself understood to them in English.
zh: 我无法用英语让他们理解我。

en: A child was born to them.
zh: 他们生了个孩子。

en: They had a child.
zh: 他们有个孩子。

en: They have no claim to the property.
zh: 他们对这处房产没有任何权利。

en: I want to ask them when their big day is.
zh: 我想问问他们的大喜之日是什么时候。

en: I want to ask them when their wedding day is.
zh: 我想问问他们的结婚纪念日是什么时候。

en: I told them again to turn down the radio.
zh: 我再次告诉他们把收音机音量调小。

en: They require extra help.
zh: 他们需要额外的帮助。

en: They had a lot of children to provide for.
zh: 他们有很多孩子要养活。

en: They have two daughters.
zh: 他们有两个女儿。

en: They have nothing to complain about.
zh: 他们没有什么可抱怨的。

en: They have their own troubles.
zh: 他们有他们自己的麻烦。

en: They haven't heard from him in a long time.
zh: 他们很久没有收到他的消息了。

en: They have twin daughters.
zh: 他们有一对双胞胎女儿。

en: They are free from care.
zh: 他们无忧无虑。

en: They had no food.
zh: 他们没有食物。

en: They had nothing to eat.
zh: 他们没有东西可吃。

en: They did not have much food to eat.
zh: 他们没有多少食物可吃。

en: They have not less than ten children.
zh: 他们至少有十个孩子。

en: They had no house in which to live.
zh: 他们没有房子可以住。

en: They have but the shadow of freedom.
zh: 他们只有自由的影子。

en: They had only one child.
zh: 他们只有一个孩子。

en: Since they had no children of their own, they decided to adopt a little girl.
zh: 因为他们没有自己的孩子，他们决定领养一个小女孩。

en: They have no sense of sin.
zh: 他们没有罪恶感。

en: They are wanting in industry.
zh: 他们缺乏勤奋。

en: They have something in common with each other.
zh: 他们彼此之间有共同之处。

en: They have no house to live in at all.
zh: 他们根本没有房子可住。

en: They hardly have any time left.
zh: 他们几乎没有时间了。

en: I haven't seen them anywhere.
zh: 我没在任何地方见过他们。

en: They have little chance to practice it.
zh: 他们几乎没有机会练习它。

en: They have the right to do so.
zh: 他们有权这样做。

en: They had two daughters, who became famous pianists.
zh: 他们有两个女儿，后来成了著名的钢琴家。

en: They have two sons and one daughter.
zh: 他们有两个儿子和一个女儿。

en: They have a ten-year-old son.
zh: 他们有一个十岁的儿子。

en: They have a lot in common.
zh: 他们有很多共同点。

en: They have nowhere else to go.
zh: 他们无处可去。

en: It's important for them to go out.
zh: 对他们来说，出去走走很重要。

en: Queer rumors about them were in the air.
zh: 关于他们的奇怪谣言四处流传。

en: They have seen better days.
zh: 他们过去的日子更好过。

en: They scarcely need it at all.
zh: 他们几乎完全不需要它。

en: Anything you could do in support of their effort would be very much appreciated.
zh: 任何你能做的支持他们努力的事情都将非常感谢。

en: He went at them with his fists.
zh: 他用拳头揍他们。

en: Don't associate with them.
zh: 不要和他们交往。

en: It's no use bandying words with them.
zh: 和他们争论毫无用处。

en: Laugh with them.
zh: 和他们一起笑。

en: I am working with them towards world peace.
zh: 我正在和他们一起为世界和平而努力。

en: You have to hurry if you want to go with them.
zh: 如果你想和他们一起去，你必须快点。

en: If you want to go with them, you must hurry.
zh: 如果你想和他们一起去，你必须快点。

en: I concurred with them in giving him the prize.
zh: 我同意他们把奖颁给他。

en: They talk a lot to one another, over the telephone and in person.
zh: 他们经常互相交谈，通过电话和亲自交谈。

en: I can't fit in with them.
zh: 我无法融入他们。

en: My association with them didn't last long.
zh: 我和他们的交往没有持续多久。

en: It is vain to argue with them about the problem.
zh: 和他们争论这个问题是徒劳的。

en: A party of scientists were on board with them.
zh: 一群科学家和他们一起在船上。

en: It will be some time before they come.
zh: 他们还需要一段时间才会来。

en: What a blessing it is that they did not come.
zh: 他们没来真是太好了。

en: I shouldn't wonder if they came after all.
zh: 如果他们最终来了，我也不会感到奇怪。

en: Until they came back, she had been busy.
zh: 在他们回来之前，她一直很忙。

en: I hope they don't resort to violence to accomplish their goals.
zh: 我希望他们不要诉诸暴力来实现他们的目标。

en: When they woke up they saw a stone lying next to them.
zh: 当他们醒来时，他们看到一块石头躺在他们旁边。

en: Don't interpret their silence as obedience.
zh: 不要把他们的沉默理解为服从。

en: I took the wheel while he slept.
zh: 他睡觉的时候我掌舵。

en: They welcomed me warmly, so I felt at home.
zh: 他们热情地欢迎我，所以我感到很自在。

en: They may properly claim the protection of the law.
zh: 他们可以正当地要求法律的保护。

en: They are hugging and kissing.
zh: 他们正在拥抱和亲吻。

en: No wonder they have elected him chairman.
zh: 难怪他们会选他当主席。

en: It is five years since they came to Japan.
zh: 他们来日本已经五年了。

en: It's been five years since they came to Japan.
zh: 他们来日本已经五年了。

en: The manual they asked him to read was two inches thick.
zh: 他们让他读的手册有两英寸厚。

en: Ten minutes after they had passed Nara, the car ran out of gas.
zh: 他们过了奈良十分钟后，车子没油了。

en: The precise time of their arrival is not known.
zh: 他们到达的准确时间尚不清楚。

en: The precise time of their arrival isn't known.
zh: 他们到达的准确时间尚不清楚。

en: I feel in my bones that they will never get along well together.
zh: 我凭直觉感到他们永远不会相处融洽。

en: It was my fault that they came late.
zh: 他们迟到是我的错。

en: Make sure that they come here late.
zh: 确保他们晚点来这里。

en: There are many problems for them to deal with.
zh: 他们有很多问题要处理。

en: You know how crazy they are over their little bundle of joy.
zh: 你知道他们有多么疼爱他们的小宝贝。

en: You must take action for their early release.
zh: 你必须采取行动，争取他们早日获释。

en: Were they busy last week?
zh: 他们上周忙吗？

en: We do not anticipate their buying a new car.
zh: 我们不期望他们会买新车。

en: They had hardly started when it began to rain.
zh: 他们刚开始就下雨了。

en: The dinner they served was badly cooked.
zh: 他们做的晚餐很难吃。

en: What does it matter how they bring up their own children?
zh: 他们怎么养育自己的孩子有什么关系呢？

en: Have they ever come on time?
zh: 他们准时来过吗？

en: I spoke slowly so that they might understand me.
zh: 我慢慢地说，以便他们能理解我。

en: His story doesn't agree with what they have said to me.
zh: 他的故事和他们对我说的不一致。

en: I was not aware of the danger until they warned me.
zh: 直到他们警告我，我才意识到危险。

en: The idea they put to us fell in exactly with what we ourselves had in mind.
zh: 他们向我们提出的想法与我们自己所想的完全一致。

en: The number of prey they killed was the same.
zh: 他们捕杀的猎物数量是一样的。

en: They were through with work.
zh: 他们已经完成了工作。

en: There was some monkey business going on when they were negotiating that last contract; money passed under the table.
zh: 他们在谈判上一份合同时搞了一些不正当的交易；有钱在暗中交易。

en: The research done by them shows that Americans are not interested in Japan.
zh: 他们所做的研究表明，美国人对日本不感兴趣。

en: I know they're in love with each other.
zh: 我知道他们彼此相爱。

en: I know that they're in love with each other.
zh: 我知道他们彼此相爱。

en: The stock they sold buyers was a lemon.
zh: 他们卖给买家的股票是次品。

en: I watched them destroy the old building.
zh: 我看着他们摧毁了旧建筑。

en: Here is a new video for them to watch.
zh: 这是一个给他们观看的新视频。

en: They stayed married for the sake of their children.
zh: 为了孩子，他们维持了婚姻。

en: The rumor that they would get married spread at once.
zh: 他们要结婚的谣言立刻传开了。

en: When they said they were going to get married, it blew my mind.
zh: 当他们说他们要结婚时，我震惊了。

en: Do you know how long they have been married?
zh: 你知道他们结婚多久了吗？

en: They have only been married two months.
zh: 他们才结婚两个月。

en: I think they have been married for five years.
zh: 我认为他们已经结婚五年了。

en: They have been married for four years.
zh: 他们已经结婚四年了。

en: When they got married, they both swore to never lie.
zh: 当他们结婚时，他们都发誓永不撒谎。

en: They got married only recently.
zh: 他们结婚不久。

en: The news of their marriage spread throughout the village.
zh: 他们结婚的消息传遍了整个村庄。

en: There can be no doubt about their marriage.
zh: 他们的婚姻是毋庸置疑的。

en: Tell me the reason why they are absent.
zh: 告诉我他们缺席的原因。

en: They were stupid not to follow your advice.
zh: 他们没有听从你的建议真是太蠢了。

en: It is good for them to work during their vacation.
zh: 在假期工作对他们有好处。

en: It's Spain that they are going to on holiday.
zh: 他们度假要去的地方是西班牙。

en: I'll wait here until they come back.
zh: 我会在这里等他们回来。

en: I will telephone you as soon as they return.
zh: 他们一回来，我就给你打电话。

en: It goes without saying that they are in the wrong.
zh: 他们是错的，这是不言而喻的。

en: There is little hope that they are alive.
zh: 他们还活着的希望渺茫。

en: It was inevitable that they would meet.
zh: 他们相遇是不可避免的。

en: It was before dawn that they got the fire under control.
zh: 他们在黎明前控制住了火势。

en: I don't care about what they say.
zh: 我不在乎他们说什么。

en: It is important that he find out what they are doing.
zh: 重要的是他要弄清楚他们在做什么。

en: When they got to the station, the train had already left.
zh: 当他们到达车站时，火车已经开走了。

en: The train had already left when they got to the station.
zh: 当他们到达车站时，火车已经开走了。

en: It is doubtful whether they will be able to swim.
zh: 他们是否能够游泳令人怀疑。

en: I saw them play baseball in the playground.
zh: 我看到他们在操场上打棒球。

en: It is surprising that they should have a second house in America.
zh: 他们在美国有第二套房子，这令人惊讶。

en: To see them sitting together, you'd take them for twins.
zh: 看到他们坐在一起，你会认为他们是双胞胎。

en: Ascertain whether they are safe or not.
zh: 确定他们是否安全。

en: We had a lot of spontaneous offers from them.
zh: 我们收到了他们很多主动提供的帮助。

en: There was not a single word of gratitude from them.
zh: 他们没有说一句感谢的话。

en: I've been expecting good news from them.
zh: 我一直在期待他们的好消息。

en: Between them they can finish in a week.
zh: 他们一起可以在一周内完成。

en: All of them are not poor.
zh: 他们并非都是穷人。

en: I like all of them.
zh: 我喜欢他们所有人。

en: Not all of them are happy.
zh: 他们并非所有人都快乐。

en: They seldom, if ever, speak in French.
zh: 他们即使说法语，也极少说。

en: Ask him whether they still live in Tokyo.
zh: 问问他他们是否还住在东京。

en: I took it for granted that they adored Hannah.
zh: 我理所当然地认为他们很喜欢汉娜。

en: I don't know why they are so steamed off at us.
zh: 我不知道他们为什么对我们这么生气。

en: I cannot understand why they are such good friends: they have little in common.
zh: 我不明白他们为什么是这么好的朋友：他们没什么共同点。

en: I can't understand why they're such good friends. They have hardly anything in common.
zh: 我不明白他们为什么是这么好的朋友。他们几乎没有任何共同点。

en: We didn't know what train they'd be on.
zh: 我们不知道他们会乘坐哪趟火车。

en: The step they took provided at best a temporary solution to the problem.
zh: 他们采取的措施充其量只是暂时解决了问题。

en: It is a mystery how they escaped from prison.
zh: 他们是如何从监狱逃脱的，这真是个谜。

en: When I saw them on a date, I asked them, "Do I hear wedding bells?"
zh: 当我看到他们约会时，我问他们，“我是否听到了婚礼的钟声？”

en: When I saw them on a date, I asked them, "Are you getting married soon?"
zh: 当我看到他们约会时，我问他们，“你们快要结婚了吗？”

en: It is strange that they should get so angry.
zh: 他们这么生气真是奇怪。

en: It seems strange that they feel so angry.
zh: 他们感到如此生气似乎很奇怪。

en: If only they hadn't done that, I might have been able to get somewhere.
zh: 要是他们没有那样做就好了，我可能已经有所成就了。

en: It was not clear whether they had accomplished it or not.
zh: 他们是否完成了这件事还不清楚。

en: It is cruel of them to make the boy work so hard.
zh: 他们让那个男孩这么努力地工作，真是太残忍了。

en: They were at the bottom of the scheme.
zh: 他们是这个阴谋的幕后黑手。

en: They don't seem to approve of the plan.
zh: 他们似乎不赞成这个计划。

en: It is worthwhile to ask what sort of picture they found there.
zh: 询问他们在那里发现了什么样的照片是值得的。

en: They have a less selfish reason for trying it.
zh: 他们尝试这样做有一个不那么自私的理由。

en: Then it dawned on me that they were speaking Spanish.
zh: 那时我才明白他们在说西班牙语。

en: I was informed that they had gone on strike.
zh: 我被告知他们已经罢工了。

en: What they are doing is ruining the economy.
zh: 他们正在做的事情正在摧毁经济。

en: The fact that they came here is undeniable.
zh: 他们来到这里的事实是不可否认的。

en: They have been here for an hour.
zh: 他们已经在这里一个小时了。

en: I wish they would stop fighting.
zh: 我希望他们停止争吵。

en: She was dismayed at their ignorance in etiquette.
zh: 她对他们在礼仪方面的无知感到沮丧。

en: It was obvious that they had told a lie.
zh: 很明显，他们说了谎。

en: Do you know when they will arrive?
zh: 你知道他们什么时候到吗？

en: There is no telling when they will come.
zh: 说不准他们什么时候来。

en: I'm ready whenever they challenge me.
zh: 他们什么时候挑战我，我都准备好了。

en: Their excuses cut no ice with her.
zh: 他们的借口对她来说毫无用处。

en: What they said to you is exactly the opposite of what they told me yesterday.
zh: 他们对你说的话和他们昨天告诉我的话完全相反。

en: Some pitied them.
zh: 有些人同情他们。

en: Neither of them seemed old.
zh: 他们俩看起来都不老。

en: They were walking two hundred meters in advance.
zh: 他们走在前面两百米。

en: He isn't coming, either.
zh: 他也不来。

en: He is neither a stock nor a stone.
zh: 他既不是木头也不是石头。

en: Both he and his sister are invited to the party.
zh: 他和他的妹妹都被邀请参加聚会。

en: Both he and his wife have cars.
zh: 他和他的妻子都有车。

en: His age is beginning to tell on him.
zh: 他的年龄开始对他产生影响了。

en: He's gotten old, too.
zh: 他也老了。

en: Because he is old, he, too, has grown weak.
zh: 因为他老了，他也变得虚弱了。

en: He's become frail in his old age.
zh: 他晚年变得体弱多病。

en: As he grew up, he learned to put things in perspective.
zh: 随着他的成长，他学会了正确看待事物。

en: He has seen better days.
zh: 他以前风光过。

en: What man has done, man can do.
zh: 人能做到的事，人也能做到。

en: Both he and I were able to solve the math problem.
zh: 我和他都能够解决这道数学题。

en: He will also go.
zh: 他也会去。

en: He'll go, too, won't he?
zh: 他也会去，不是吗？

en: Both he and I are high school students.
zh: 我和他都是高中生。

en: I have nothing more to say about him.
zh: 关于他，我没什么好说的了。

en: It may be that he is not a bad man.
zh: 也许他不是个坏人。

en: He is not coming, either.
zh: 他也不会来。

en: His English will improve in the course of time.
zh: 他的英语会随着时间的推移而提高。

en: He plays it smart!
zh: 他很会耍小聪明！

en: He gets tough at times.
zh: 他有时候会变得很强硬。

en: He was finally forced to resign.
zh: 他最终被迫辞职。

en: He has finally shown his true colors.
zh: 他终于露出了他的真面目。

en: He has at last retired from public office.

zh: 他从树上掉了下来。

en: He strung a rope between the two trees.
zh: 他在两棵树之间拉了一根绳子。

en: He cut off a branch from the tree.
zh: 他从树上砍下了一根树枝。

en: He's raking it in.
zh: 他赚了很多钱。

en: He fixed the net.
zh: 他修好了网。

en: He didn't half swear.
zh: 他狠狠地骂了一通。

en: He is very taken up with building model airplanes.
zh: 他非常热衷于制作模型飞机。

en: He likes to build model planes.
zh: 他喜欢制作模型飞机。

en: Because he didn't want to lose face, he refused my offer to help him.
zh: 因为他不想丢面子，所以他拒绝了我帮助他的提议。

en: He did it for fun.
zh: 他这样做是为了好玩。

en: He has no sense of humor.
zh: 他没有幽默感。

en: He sees no company.
zh: 他不喜欢与人交往。

en: He knows many amusing magic tricks.
zh: 他会很多有趣的魔术戏法。
